on reading compounds: 形【カタチ】form, shape, figure, visage
陣容【ジンヨウ】battle formation, battle array, lineup (of a team, etc.), cast, staff, team structure
kun reading compounds: 入れる【いれる】to put in, to let in, to take in, to bring in, to insert, to install (e.g. software), to set (a jewel, etc.), to ink in (e.g. tattoo), to admit, to accept, to employ, to hire, to accept, to comply, to grant, to adopt (a policy, etc.), to take (advice, etc.), to listen to, to pay attention to, to include, to pay (one's rent, etc.), to cast (a vote), to make (tea, coffee, etc.), to turn on (a switch, etc.), to send (a fax), to call
